node.name: VideoSlideshow
node.description: A software designed to create lyric slideshows. This software allows users to combine lyrics with background videos, resulting in a visually engaging slideshow that synchronizes the lyrics with the video footage.

node.name: YouAttend
node.description: A cross-platform, local-first React Native app for face recognition-based attendance tracking. Powered by Facenet with TFLite and ONNX frameworks (Java implementation), and stores attendance data in a vector database that is based on SQLite.

node.name: Data-Analysis-Dashboard
node.description: : A data visualization dashboard for analyzing company performance trends over time. Built with Python, Flask, and AmCharts to deliver interactive and insightful visualizations.

node.name: SS-to-ical
node.description: A web scraper that converts schedules from Ellucianâ„¢Self-Service into ICS files, enabling seamless integration with calendar providers. Uses puppeteer to scrape your self-service dashboard to get the data

node.name: AdaGrad-Math-303
node.description: An implementation of the Adagrad optimization algorithm from scratch as a TensorFlow optimizer, showcasing a deep understanding of optimization techniques. as a project for Linear and non linear programming course

node.name: mhealth-classification
node.description: A machine learning project for classifying mobile health activities using sensors. Implements models like KNN, SVM, Logistic Regression, and Neural Networks.
